snippet.title: Creepy Mahjong - Video Game Trailer (Mahjong solitaire with dark theme)
snippet.description:
Creepy Mahjong is a mahjong solitaire with dark theme.

- Creepy story and atmosphere

- Decide when stay to fight or escape (no hints or shuffle, you are in control if you want to escape)

- Different level paths in every game (depending on your victory or escape)
- 34 levels + endless levels with the level editor
- Defeat 2 of the 12 possible final bosses to win the game

Thanks to the editor, you can design your level and get a secret code to share your creation with your friends and your community!


Buy the game here:

[ Steam ]
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1719980/Creepy_Mahjong

[ itch.io ]
https://biim-games.itch.io/creepy-mahjong

[ Game Jolt ]
https://gamejolt.com/games/Creepy_Mahjong/634254

[ Kartridge ]
https://www.kartridge.com/games/Biim_Games/creepy-mahjong

Share and play other players' level here:
https://itch.io/board/562180/share-your-levels
